channel.title: Iron arrows look like capes on ground and in inv?
channel.description: I know it has to do something with the cache, i think? but if i have 2-4 iron arrows it looks like capes. Under 2 it looks like an arrow and over for it looks like an arrow. Anyone help me? Thanks.

item.title: Iron arrows look like capes on ground and in inv?
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Edit the model id’s in itemdef.java and in your ‘Raw’ folder in the cache into another number

Read full topic
item.source: Iron arrows look like capes on ground and in inv?
